headline: DAGE-MTI SERIES 68 INFRARED CAMERA
keywords: controls polaroid ccd 35mm adaptor wild zeiss
specstable:
Manufacturer Dage-MTI
Model SERIES 68
Description Infrared Camera
Camera
Type Other
Accessories

Two available
One Silicone tube installed: 400 to 1100 nm
One with Newvicon tube installed: 400-850nm

Other Information

Features:

  • Linearity distortion: 0.25% or Less 52dB Signal-To-Noise Ratio
  • Selectable Bandwidth
  • High Resolution (Up to 1200 TV lines)
  • Completely Automatic Operation
  • Remote Video Polarity Reversal
  • Drive Lock Inputs
  • Multiple sync Standards EIA RS-330, RS-170 & 343
  • Drive Outputs for System Interface
  • Type C Lens Mount
  • Camera Mount: Three 1/4" x 20 tapped holes
  • Coaxial Connector: BNC
    Lense not included
Power Requirements 115 V 60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Very Good
